actions.committee: Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to amend the National and Community Service Act of 1990 to establish a Veterans Corps program.
subjects: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

summary.text: Amends the National and Community Service Act of 1990 to include as an authorized national service program a Veteran Corps program that meets specified unmet needs of members of the Armed Forces and veterans, as well as their families.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National and Community Service Act of 1990 to establish a Veterans Corps program.
